problem: Given I is the midpoint of EG. I is the midpoint of FH and EG . Complete the proof that EF∥GH . (Elements:  GH ,  ∠GIH ,  △EFI ,  ∠GHI ,  HI ,  GI ,  ∠EFI ,  ∠EIF ,  EF ,  EI ,  △GHI ,  FI , )
statement: I is the midpoint of FH
I is the midpoint of EG
reason: Converse of Alternate Interior Angles Theorem
